```{r}
install.packages("hexSticker")
```

```{r}
library(hexSticker)
sticker(expression(plot(cars, cex=.5, cex.axis=.5, mgp=c(0,.3,0), xlab="", ylab="")),
        package="hexSticker", p_size=8, s_x=1, s_y=.8, s_width=1.2, s_height=1,
        filename="hexsticker.png")
```
